sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>

    <v-app-bar app color="#1F7087">
      <v-app-bar-title class="text-white font-weight-black">管理后台登入</v-app-bar-title>
    </v-app-bar>



    <v-main>
      <v-container fluid>
        <v-row class="justify-center align-center" style="height: 95vh;">
            <v-card width="400" class="">
              <!--            <v-img-->
              <!--                height="200"-->
              <!--                src="https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2020/07/12/07/47/bee-5396362_1280.jpg"-->
              <!--                cover-->
              <!--                class="text-white"-->
              <!--            >-->
              <!--            </v-img>-->

              <v-card-title class="font-weight-black mt-2">管理员登入</v-card-title>

              <v-card-text>
                <v-form
                    ref="form"
                    v-model="valid"
                    lazy-validation
                >
                  <v-text-field
                      v-model="username"
                      label="用户名"
                      required
                      class="font-weight-black"
                  ></v-text-field>

                  <v-text-field
                      v-model="password"
                      label="密码"
                      required
                      class="font-weight-black"
                  ></v-text-field>

                  <v-btn
                      color="#1F7087"
                      class="mr-4 font-weight-black text-white"
                      @click="validate"
                  >
                    登入
                  </v-btn>

                </v-form>
              </v-card-text>
            </v-card>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>

    <v-footer app>

    </v-footer>

  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import {useRouter} from "vue-router";
import {useStore} from "vuex";
import {adminLogin} from "../../../../network/adminLogin";
import {reactive, toRefs} from "vue";

export default {
  name: "adminLogin",
  setup() {

    const router = useRouter();
    const store = useStore();

    const userinfo = reactive({
      username: '',
      password: ''
    })

    const validate = () => {
      adminLogin(userinfo).then(res=>{
        window.localStorage.setItem('JWT_Token', res.data.token);
        store.commit('setAdminIsLogin', true);
        router.push("/adminmain");
      })
    }

    return {
      ...toRefs(userinfo),
      validate,
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
